channel.title: Kiwi's Blog Feed
channel.description: I wonder how many people would follow my blogs using this feed...

item.title: Wobbledogs
item.description:
Goofy dogs and unethical breeding practises

Somewhat recently, I came across some videos of Wobbledogs, a game where you breed and feed wobbledogs and get interesting characteristics. I enjoy this type of game, and it just so happened that there's a sale on Steam, so I purchased the game.

...Continue reading

item.title: Poppin-Play Kitchen
item.description:
"Have you ever made egg toast with your life on the line?" - @quietlywhispering

I haven't tried any horror media for a while, but recently I stumbled upon this pilot called Poppin-Play Kitchen. It's created by Zemyata, an animator which I've been following.

...Continue reading

item.title: Do not vent using search engines |CW|
item.description:
Trying not to be trapped in a negative spiral

Content Warning: Mental health problems

As a mentally-troubled person, I can suddenly go from alright to anxious with a very small trigger. I really hate to bother anyone, so my method of venting is usually typing how I feel on search engine. The way it (theoretically) works is that it will show posts of people having a similar experience as me, and commenters may have some good suggestions that could help me.

...Continue reading

item.title: CRK: The Dark Enchantress War
item.description:
@FountGPT write me a blog about the war

With Millennial Tree breaking Dark Enchantress' barrier, it's time for the Ancients to break through, the war between the darkness and cookies starts now. And surprisingly, the story is quite entertaining.

Warning for dissociation (I think)

item.title: JS-like CSS
item.description:
Theme toggle buttons, pop ups, CSS can do that!

So in my many years of learning coding and Javascript, I have utilised JS a lot in my website, ranging from blog tag filtering, fetch APIs for the index page, image viewers, and more. While using them too much might slow down the site, there are just so many stuff I want to do, I couldn't stop adding new JS code!

...Continue reading

item.title: AIA Carnival 2026
item.description:
Wow I have a life

I sometimes go to cool places like theme parks and museums, I don't mention them a lot in my blogs just in case there's insanely intellegent doxxers/stalkers who can learn my location by the slightest info I mention. However, I really wanted to talk about it, just because there's one photo that I believe should be left a mark in my blogs.

...Continue reading

item.title: The water heater broke
item.description:
Why does it has to be winter...

So back in 1 Sep 2025, I mentioned so much I am afraid of malfunctioning machines, and one of which is the water heater at my home. It's eerie LED glow, showing just a ten digit number, like a machine planning your next demise... Anyways why do I mention this? It's malfunctioning.

...Continue reading
